Articles.Content:
I started playing about a month ago, but decided to finally start partaking in the forums, and figured I'd say hello.  

I've already found the joys that some of the mod creators have created, and am starting a new career to take advantage of some of them.

Can't wait to check out some of the other planets in the Kerbol system.
Hello, and welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay!

Welcome to the forums!

Enjoy your stay!

Have fun with ksp!!!!

I would recommend you get vens stock revanp. It updates everything and looks so good!!!
